executable.title: Register Image to Tubes Using Rigid Transform (TubeTK)
executable.description: Registration of a vessel to its location within an image.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Volume
image.description: Binary image demonstrating where the tube is located after it has been registered.

double.name: gaussianBlurStdDev
double.label: Gaussian Blur Standard Deviation
double.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel used to blur input volume. This increases the likelihood that the vessel spatial object overlaps with the vessel image at their initial alignment and enlarges the convergence zone.
